company.question: Why choose our company?
company.explication: PGD Group is a consulting firm specializing in the promotional market with more than 8 years of experience where we put at the disposal of our nationals and internationals clients our perspective of innovation, always focused on objectives.

service.title: Our Services
service.description: PGD puts at your disposal all the necessary services in order to develop its promotional campaign since the inception of the idea to the final customer final covering all their needs..

service1.title: Purchasing Offices
service1.description: Team of 6 people in Shenzhen (China) and 3 people in Hanoi (VietNam) responsible for performing audits of factories and purchases of products.

service2.title: Design & Production
service2.description: Service for the personalization of products requested by our clients, adapting to their needs and requirements.

service3.title: Quality Assurance
service3.description: All our factories are previously audited by the PGD Group to avoid problems during production and subsequently passed a quality control on all manufactured products based on the level of AQL required by our client.

service4.title: Storage & Distribution
service4.description: We have warehouses in China, VietNam and in Spain, thus having the possibility to make distributions to anywhere in Spain regardless of the number of shipments or destinations.

service5.title: Technical Service
service5.description: This service is created to serve and satisfy the needs of our clients and customers at the same time.

service6.title: Call Center
service6.description: A group of people previously formed can be ordered to give the necessary support for any product or action.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.description: The experience and versatility of our equipment allows to create any campaign for any sector related to the promotional Marketing.

sectors.title: Our Sectors
sectors.description: After years of experience behind us, we are present in most relevant sectors customers as:

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We remain at your disposal for any questions or concerns that have. Our customer service staff will be happy to help them.
contact.name: Name *
contact.email-error: You must enter a valid email
contact.phone-error: You must enter a valid phone
contact.subject: Subject

footer.description: PGD Group is a consulting firm specializing in the promotional market with more than 8 years of experience where we put at the disposal of our nationals and internationals clients our perspective of innovation, always focused on objectives.
